task.title: Logging in to the Zowe Desktop
task.shortdesc: Access and navigate the Zowe Desktop to view the Zowe applications.

taskbody.context: You will use the Firefox browser to enter the provided URL to log in to Zowe Desktop.

step.cmd: In the taskbar, click the icon of Firefox to start the browser.
Enter the following URL in the address bar to access the login page: https://10.149.60.146:8544/ZLUX/plugins/org.zowe.zlux.bootstrap/web/index.html
On the login page of the Zowe Desktop, enter your mainframe credentials.

taskbody.result:
Upon authentication of your user name and password, the Zowe desktop opens.
Several applications are pinned to the taskbar. Click the Start menu and you will see a list of applications that are installed by default. You can pin other applications to the taskbar by right-clicking the application icon and selecting Pin to taskbar.

postreq.p: You will use the JES Explorer to query the jobs with filters and view the related status.
